title: Help us test Clash this weekend

replies.body:
Well damn, I broke clash already! Notification told me to head to my Clash Tab a day early, when there is no tab!....

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Also rito, your client store is broken
You broke it, hooray! We're aware of the store issue, working on fixes now. Thanks, Krayz!
erorr 999

hello, i had fun experiencing the clash mode for the first time, everything appeared to work and my team won both our games, overall an enjoyable experience, my only quarrel was that i only gained 400 points and i need 500 to gain the beta banner? in which i cannot see any way of getting to 500 points? we won all games, nothing else i could of done right? so miss out on that? woulda been nice to get a trophy and the banner, but gained neither. oh well, look forward to the future of clash anyway. thanks

Hey you three, this is a great callout. The target was aimed at those who had also been in the previous one day Clash test in OCE as the points carried over to this one – but that left y'all who helped us test this time without any cool rewards for your dominant victories. We're gonna reduce the banner price to 400 VP and retroactively get these to anyone who earned that amount over the next few weeks.
thank you
Where can I spend victory point and receive the beta cup banner?

> [{quoted}](name=skatekiddo,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=pmWruLIg,comment-id=001500020002,timestamp=2018-10-23T05:49:53.485+0000)
>
> Where can I spend victory point and receive the beta cup banner?

It's not live yet, but this will be actioned in early November!
cheers, appreciate it a lot.

I agree! We tried so hard to win both games (and did win) but don't have anything to show from it besides the icon :c I wish that we got more VP for winning, the whole team was really hoping to get the banner before the new rewards theme starts. Rito pls give us some more points!

I agree with Juggernaut, my team won both games, one as a pretty heavy stomp, but only got 400VP, 200 per win and with not being able to have received VP any other way other than the failed first Clash test this really sucks on not being able to gain the banner...
since this is on the pbe, would i get the rewards on my pbe account or my oce account?
This will be a live test on the OCE servers, not on PBE.
Seras Dragon is correct (as always). This one's a test on the OCE client.
Wish Riot would pull back the time by an hour so that NZ players don't have to start at 9PM.
Ikr it’s so annoying starting at 9pm. make it start at 6pm AEST so us people in NZ can actually play clash XD.

Sorry guys, I know the late start is rough.

The problem with a 6pm AEDT start is that means it will be 3pm in Western Australia (rough for those on the other side of OCE – especially when Fridays start back up due to a clash with work/school). At the moment start is 4pm in WA, 7pm for Eastern Australia and 9pm for NZ. It's not ideal – but at least this way there's a fighting chance all OCE legends have a chance to play!

What we REALLY need is that jerk Zilean to lend us some of his time nonsense, that would solve everything.
all in good time, the way is always the same

how long will clash go when it starts at 7pm saturday?
is it just a couple of hours? or will it take the whole weekend?
It's only a short test! Teams'll play two games.
Is clash up tonight?
They should of make a best of 3
Can we have more Clash game in OCE? I love this mode so much!
This test gave us a lot of info moving forward. We're going to trial this one day test in other regions over the next week and then we can look at building it out for full weekend tests. Stay tuned!
When's the next clash for day 2?

>[We’re ready for a one-day test in Oceania](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/help-us-test-clash-weekend)

It was a one day test only. There aren't anymore games this time around.
clash is appearing me for
does it only cover saturday or sunday also?

>We’re ready for a one-day test in Oceania

Just Saturday.
Is there clash on sunday? (Tonight) or was it saturday only?

>We’re ready for a one-day test in Oceania

Just Saturday.
Cx gang 4 lyf
xd boiz
it was fun, when is the next clash?
it was fun <3 i won both games :D
Having lv 2 honor, that takes a very very very long time.. in a game where you can get reported for just about anything is silly for clash. Youre just killing off more players for your "test" phase.
{{summoner:50}} its been longer than 4 seconds
The wanderer isn't always lost
*Crash
no clash tab feelsbadman :sadpepe:
:sorrypepe:    :(
So this is just a one day test and the real thing is coming later on?
Yup! We need to do some proper testing before this thing is ready to realise its full form. This test is a 4-player bracket – so two games.
I just got ranked do I have to finish my placement games or can I {{summoner:6}} by??? I mean can we get rid of that and let players play by lvl.
You'll need to finish your placements to join the test, unfortunately.

Hey Riot, how long will the clash go for? 1 game or multiple? need to know if i can participate due to work commitments later in the night! 
Thanks!
Hey Hide on Skaar! (Faker, is that you?) It's a 4-team bracket so there will be two games.
Are there any rewards for this (like skin shards or BE). The short notice means I couldn't prep a team but I'd hate to miss out on much!!
